explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black tank top and a black hat stands on a wooden ladder at the opening of a wooden board. The opening is square, and the board is covered with many colorful small toys. Next to the toys are a clean yellow toy car and a dirty yellow toy car. Beside the toy cars is a black walkie-talkie with an antenna and a red button. Next to the walkie-talkie is a pink toy with two large white wheels. Both the pink toy and the black walkie-talkie are covered in dust.

[0-4] The man then reveals a surprised expression, his eyes wide open and his mouth slightly ajar. He takes out a blue plastic bag and starts putting many toys from the wooden board into the bag. The scene switches to show only the pink toy car left on the board. The man reaches for the pink toy with his left hand and brings it to the opening of the board.

The scene cuts to a man wearing a blue and white striped shirt and a white hat. He has a toy car under each hand. The man and the toy cars are on a flat surface. He releases the car under his left hand and pushes the other car with his right hand, causing the first car to fall off the surface.

The scene changes to show the man squatting behind a wooden fence, looking through a gap.
